snippet: Ms. Roberts was one of the last living members of the cast of the original musical, which was Richard Rodgers and Oscar Hammerstein’s first collaboration.
abstract: Joan Roberts, actress who created the role of Laurey in the original Broadway production of the musical Oklahoma!, dies at age 95.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Roberts was one of the last living members of the cast of the original musical, which was Richard Rodgers and Oscar Hammerstein’s first collaboration.

headline.seo: Joan Roberts, Heroine of Original ‘Oklahoma!,’ Dies at 95
headline.main: Joan Roberts Dies at 95; Original ‘Oklahoma!’ Star
headline.print_headline: Joan Roberts Dies at 95; Original ‘Oklahoma!’ Star
